TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract PageSetup

Docs.summary: Represents the page setup description. The PageSetup object contains all page setup attributes (left margin, bottom margin, paper size, and so on) as properties.

remarks.para: Use the PageSetup property to return a PageSetup object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Application

Docs.summary: Returns an object that represents the Microsoft Word application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BookFoldPrinting { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.BookFoldPrinting : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True for Microsoft Word to print a document in a series of booklets so the printed pages can be folded and read as a book.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BookFoldPrintingSheets { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.BookFoldPrintingSheets : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets an Integer which represents the number of pages for each booklet.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BookFoldRevPrinting { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.BookFoldRevPrinting : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True for Microsoft Word to reverse the printing order for book fold printing of bidirectional or Asian language documents.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float BottomMargin { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.BottomMargin : single with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the bottom edge of the page and the bottom boundary of the body text.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float CharsLine { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.CharsLine : single with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the number of characters per line in the document grid.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

remarks.para: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD." This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD. For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DifferentFirstPageHeaderFooter { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.DifferentFirstPageHeaderFooter : int with get, set

Docs.summary: True if a different header or footer is used on the first page. Can be True, False, or wdUndefined.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperTray FirstPageTray { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperTray get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperTray value); };
member this.FirstPageTray : Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPaperTray with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the paper tray to use for the first page of a document or section.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float FooterDistance { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.FooterDistance : single with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the footer and the bottom of the page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float Gutter { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.Gutter : single with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the amount (in points) of extra margin space added to each page in a document or section for binding.

remarks.para: If the property is set to True, the Gutter property adds the extra space to the inside margins. Otherwise, the extra space is added to the left margin.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool GutterOnTop { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.GutterOnTop : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Reserved for internal use.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdGutterStyle GutterPos { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdGutterStyle get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdGutterStyle value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets on which side the gutter appears in a document.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdGutterStyleOld GutterStyle { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdGutterStyleOld get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdGutterStyleOld value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets whether Microsoft Word uses gutters for the current document based on a right-to-left language or a left-to-right language.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float HeaderDistance { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.HeaderDistance : single with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the header and the top of the page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdLayoutMode LayoutMode { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdLayoutMode get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdLayoutMode value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the layout mode for the current document.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float LeftMargin { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.LeftMargin : single with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the left edge of the page and the left boundary of the body text.

remarks.para: If the property is set to True, the LeftMargin property controls the setting for inside margins and the property controls the setting for outside margins.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::LineNumbering ^ LineNumbering { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::LineNumbering ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::LineNumbering ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the object that represents the line numbers for the specified object.

remarks.para: You must be in print layout view to see line numbering.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float LinesPage { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.LinesPage : single with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the number of lines per page in the document grid.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MirrorMargins { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MirrorMargins : int with get, set

Docs.summary: True if the inside and outside margins of facing pages are the same width. Can be True, False, or wdUndefined.

remarks.para: If the MirrorMargins property is set to True, the property controls the setting for inside margins and the property controls the setting for outside margins.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int OddAndEvenPagesHeaderFooter { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.OddAndEvenPagesHeaderFooter : int with get, set

Docs.summary: True if the specified object has different headers and footers for odd-numbered and even-numbered pages. Can be True, False, or wdUndefined.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdOrientation Orientation { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdOrientation get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdOrientation value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the orientation of the page.

remarks.para: Some of the constants may not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that youâ€™ve selected or installed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperTray OtherPagesTray { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperTray get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperTray value); };
member this.OtherPagesTray : Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPaperTray with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the paper tray to be used for all but the first page of a document or section.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float PageHeight { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.PageHeight : single with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the height of the page in points.

remarks.para: Setting the PageHeight property changes the property to wdPaperCustom.
Use the PaperSize property to set the page height and width to those of a predefined paper size, such as Letter or A4.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float PageWidth { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.PageWidth : single with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the width of the page in points.

remarks.para: Setting the PageWidth property changes the property to wdPaperCustom.
Use the PaperSize property to set the page height and width to those of a predefined paper size, such as Letter or A4.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperSize PaperSize { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperSize get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdPaperSize value); };
member this.PaperSize : Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPaperSize with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the paper size.

remarks.para: Setting the or property changes the PaperSize property to wdPaperCustom.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parent As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Parent { System::Object ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns an object that represents the parent object of the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float RightMargin { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.RightMargin : single with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the right edge of the page and the right boundary of the body text.

remarks.para: If the property is set to True, the RightMargin property controls the setting for outside margins and the property controls the setting for inside margins.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSectionDirection SectionDirection { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSectionDirection get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSectionDirection value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the reading order and alignment for the specified sections.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSectionStart SectionStart { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSectionStart get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdSectionStart value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the type of section break for the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetAsTemplateDefault() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Sets the specified page setup formatting as the default for the active document and all new documents based on the active template.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowGrid { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowGrid : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: This member is for Macintosh only and should not be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SuppressEndnotes { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SuppressEndnotes : int with get, set

Docs.summary: True if endnotes are printed at the end of the next section that doesn't suppress endnotes. Suppressed endnotes are printed before the endnotes in that section.

remarks.para: This property takes effect only if the property is set to wdEndOfSection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::TextColumns ^ TextColumns { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::TextColumns ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::TextColumns ^ value); };
member this.TextColumns : Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TextColumns with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns a collection that represents the set of text columns for the specified object.

remarks.para: There will always be at least one text column in the collection. When you create new text columns, you're adding to a collection of one column.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void TogglePortrait() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Switches between portrait and landscape page orientations for a document or section.

remarks.para: If the specified sections have different page orientations, an error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float TopMargin { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.TopMargin : single with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the distance (in points) between the top edge of the page and the top boundary of the body text.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TwoPagesOnOne { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.TwoPagesOnOne : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: True if Microsoft Word prints the specified document two pages per sheet.

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the vertical alignment of text on each page in a document or section.
